channel.title: NPCdrops.TSM file change....solved!
channel.description:
hey guys im new to this, and i keep running into servers what have npcdrops.TSM,
can someome explain how to change them or recommend a server/client what has the old system of edit i.e the NPCdrops.java thank you all for reading. :palm:

item.title: NPCdrops.TSM file change....solved!
item.dc:creator: @wayo0o wayo0o
item.description:
@wayo0o wrote:

well what i did was just use a my back up and went back a few steps what i found really annoying lol,
( back to the point where you helped me with the KS error what i had)

it didnt give me errors it just didnt drop anything so im going to read that link youve posted and try get my head around it

item.title: NPCdrops.TSM file change....solved!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Did the server show an error when trying to start up?

Perhaps you missed a line or put something in the wrong place.

You can use a site like http://pastebin.org to show me your .TSM file and maybe I could see your error.

Read full topic

item.title: NPCdrops.TSM file change....solved!
item.dc:creator: @wayo0o wayo0o
item.description:
@wayo0o wrote:

you did then i edited it and then it just stopped dropping items, so after 24 hours of looking for a fix without pestering people, iv come to the conclusion that i just need to find a easy server to work on just to get grips of it, like you said those kinda files are annoying to work on

Read full topic

item.title: NPCdrops.TSM file change....solved!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I thought I already explained how the NPCDrops.TSM file worked for you?
Before considering going to the other system, you can try this for help on understanding the TSM.
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/380385-npc-drops-tutorial-noob-friendly.html

But if you still want to use the .java way (Which is bad, in like everyone’s opinion):
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/287241-new-npc-drop-system-pi-emulous.html
Here’s a grip of drops for that too:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/configuration/505295-npc-drops-pi.html

Read full topic
